city_1.name: Bogor
city_1.subtitle: Tourism in Bogor
city_1.description: The city of Bogor is known as the City of Rain because it has high rainfall. Historical traces from the Pakuan Pajajaran Kingdom to the Dutch East Indies are proven by various historical artifacts that have been preserved to this day. The Bogor Botanical Gardens are one of the city's tourism icons.

recommendation.name: Mountain Mas
recommendation.description: Mountain Mas Agro Puncak Tea Garden tourism is a sensation that continues to grow with complete facilities and accommodation including the Gunung Mas Cluster Camping Ground model location on the edge of the tea walk tourist route with a cool atmosphere with cold air up to 18% Celsius at night. so that the atmosphere and campfire are the best friends to accompany your togetherness. Gunung Mas is a wise and effective choice with extraordinary benefits.

hidden_gems.name: Curug Balong Endah
hidden_gems.description: Balong Endah Waterfall is open to the public every day from 7 am to 5 pm. It's best if you come to visit when it's not the rainy season. That way, the volume of the waterfall will be more stable and the water will tend to be clearer.
hidden_gems.address: Kawasan Wisata Gunung Salak Endah Pasir Lenyit, Jl. Curug Pangeran, Kec. Pamijahan, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat 16810

hotel.name: The Botanica Sanctuary
hotel.description: The Botanica Sanctuary Hotel in Bogor offers a peaceful haven that combines beauty, relaxation and discovery. The hotel comprises of 166 luminous rooms – including 38 Suites, two restaurants and a rooftop infinity pool. Being ideally situated in the heart of the Puncak, the hotel affords breathtaking views of  Mount Pangrango and virgin pine forest. It is only 5 minutes away from the Taman Safari Indonesia, a world-class zoo and is titled the best conservation site by the Indonesian Ministry of Forestry.

hotel.name: The Grand Hill
hotel.description:
The Grand Hill is located in Puncak area, which is approximately 2 hours from Jakarta. The hotel is traditionally designed with Javanese and Balinese influence, with all the modern conveniences to make your stay both enjoyable and memorable. The hotel provides 89 luxury guests rooms, 6 villas and 5 function rooms.

 

Your experience starts when you step into The Grand Hill hotel lobby. The open lobby area let the cool and fresh mountain air through and refreshes the senses. The friendly staff will help you with your check in process and the concierge will take you to your room so you can relax and get ready to explore the beautiful surroundings.

 

The hotel is situated on a hill which provides it with a spectacular view of Mount Salak. Feel the stress of daily life melts away as you relax in the infinity pool, explore the tranquil grounds surrounding the hotel, and enjoy the sunset view.

 

The Grand Hill also provides excellent dining experience with its two restaurants, The Grand Hill Bistro-Café and Kupu-Kupu. The Bistro offers a myriad of international cuisine, while Kupu-Kupu offers you an authentic Indonesian dining experience.

 

The fully equipped function rooms are ideal for company events and conferences. We can tailor-made a package to suit the needs of the company, including food and accommodation. If you are looking for a relaxing, stress free and tranquil experience, look no further.

things_todo.name: Eagle Hill Camp
things_todo.description: As a campground in the pristine nature of the Puncak mountains with its beauty and coolness, Eagle Hill provides services as a place for activities, lodging, food and outbound/training events.
things_todo.address: Jl Al Barokah, Megamendung, Kec. Megamendung, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat 16770

things_todo.name: Paragliding Puncak Bogor
things_todo.description: Paragliding is a free flying sport using fabric wings (parachutes) that are taken off with the feet for recreation or competition purposes.
things_todo.address: Jl. Raya Puncak Gadog, Tugu Sel., Kec. Cisarua, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat

city_4.name: Medan
city_4.subtitle: Tourism in Medan
city_4.description: The City of Medan, with all its uniqueness, is a city that reflects the diversity of Indonesia and is the center of economic and cultural activities in the North Sumatra region.

recommendation.name: Bukit Lawang
recommendation.description: Bukit Lawang is an attractive tourist destination for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts, providing unique experiences through encounters with orangutans and the natural beauty of tropical rainforests.

hidden_gems.name: Pemandian Air Panas Pariban
hidden_gems.description: This hot spring tourism is famous for its natural hot springs which offer beautiful views, comfort and fresh air
hidden_gems.address: Desa, Semangat Gunung, Kec. Merdeka, Kabupaten Karo, Sumatera Utara 22153

hotel.name: Jungle Inn Hotel
hotel.description: The Jungle In Hotel in Bukit Lawang Hotel with 2-star accommodation in Bukit Lawang, offering free Wi-Fi, evening entertainment and bicycle/car rental services. Located 117 km from Kualanamu International Airport, with paid shuttle service.

hotel.name: Taman Simalem Resort
hotel.description: Taman Simalem Resort is one of the tourist destinations in Karo Regency. Located in the hilly area west of Lake Toba and is known as a magnificent and luxurious resort around Lake Toba.

things_todo.name: Lawang Sewu
things_todo.address: Jl. Rahadi Usman, Tengah, Kec. Pontianak
